description: System-wide unique code identifying a department/cost center for billing and reporting (often aligns to finance/GL).
Numeric sequence controlling display/print ordering of departments.
Short, user-facing name/description of the department.
User ID for the primary department administrator/approver, used for workflow/notifications; confirm with SME.
User ID for a secondary department administrator/approver; likely backup for workflow/notifications; confirm with SME.
User ID for a tertiary department administrator/approver; likely backup for workflow/notifications; confirm with SME.
User or process that created the department record.
Timestamp when the department record was created.
User or process that last modified the department record.
Timestamp of the most recent update to the department record.
Y/N indicator showing whether the department is active and available for selection in transactions.
Program or functional area associated with the department, used for organizational reporting and budgeting.
Billing/cost allocation code used to charge expenses to the department; likely links to external finance or AR; confirm with SME.
